settings.content: If you require any support please review the [documentation](http://atlantic-theme-minimal.myshopify.com/pages/documentation) or contact us at [support@pixelunion.net](mailto:support@pixelunion.net)
Find us on the web: [Pixel Union](http://www.pixelunion.net) | Twitter: [@pixelunion](http://twitter.com/pixelunion) | Facebook: [http://facebook.com/pixelunion](http://facebook.com/pixelunion)
If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the spelling to use here, refer to the first checkout page.

settings.label: Number of results to display per page

settings.content: Disable this if you're having trouble integrating with 3rd Party apps or using line item properties.

* Separate currency codes with a space. Use the ISO 4217 3-letter currency code ( [list of currency codes](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php) ). Example: CAD USD. While prices can be displayed on the store front in different currencies, Shopify will process orders in the shop’s main currency.

Retina logos are displayed on devices that have a higher than normal pixel density. Using this option will ensure that your logo looks great on all devices (e.g., iPad with retina display). Retina logos should be uploaded at exactly double the dimensions of your regular logo. So if your regular logo is 140x80 then your retina logo would be 280x160. Important: If using a retina logo, the 'logo height' field is required. Enter the height of your regular logo.

Intro headline
settings.default: Interested in becoming a Primally Pure affiliate?

settings.label: Intro text
settings.default: We're so happy you stopped by to learn more about our affiliate program. Here at Primally Pure, we handcraft 100% natural + non-toxic skincare products in our sunny Southern California workshop and would love for you to join us in spreading the word that real, recognizable ingredients really can provide lasting results - without sacrificing your health + well-being.

settings.label: Perks bullets
settings.default:
15% commissions on all sales referred (365 day cookie window)

10% commissions on all deodorant subscriptions for lifetime value of customer (*10% commissions also apply for non-subscription deodorant purchases)

Exclusive discounts on new products + other exciting perks

Generous incentives, monthly goals and fun contests (a little friendly competition!)

Marketing materials, professional photos and promotional resources to help grow your referral business

Personal contact with a committed PP team member to support your success

settings.label: Who We Are text
settings.default: Our heart to holistically care for the skin + self with natural, non-toxic ingredients is the thread that weaves through our products, projects and partnerships. We strive to lead our lives in the same way we create our products: infused with integrity, simplicity and purity. We believe in daily baths and that beauty goes much deeper than simply skincare.

settings.label: Who We Are text
settings.default: You are simplicity-focused and seek to support your health + well-being by choosing real, natural + non-toxic alternatives to conventional beauty products. Your commitment to living a healthy and natural lifestyle inspires others to follow in your footsteps. You cultivate authentic, meaningful relationships with your community and make a positive difference in the lives of others.

settings.label: Are We a Fit text
settings.default: We'd love to learn more about you + your brand and how it aligns with our mission.

settings.label: Testimonial 0
settings.default: I can’t say enough praises about both Primally Pure’s amazing product line and affiliate program. I love the ease of use of their affiliate platform and the ladies behind the brand are very responsive and thoughtful when need help or have questions about products. I carefully select the products and brands I choose to use personally and also promote to my audience and I always feel completely confident recommending Primally Pure to others. Their products truly work and provide a safe and effective solution to skin and body care! Their boutique, all natural products have transformed my skin and the affiliate commission helps keep my website and business operating so I can continue to provide my audience with helpful content!

settings.label: Testimonial 1
settings.default: I've had nothing but a fantastic experience since becoming a Primally Pure affiliate. The team at Primally Pure EXCELS at customer service, so I know that my readers are in excellent hands. Their products are of the absolute highest quality in natural skincare and it’s a pleasure recommending my favorites to readers. I find that readers are grateful for reviews and product suggestions while affiliate commissions make a good contribution to my business. Overall, anyone with a readership in the health, wellness, or beauty industry would be hard-pressed to find a company more dedicated to taking GREAT care of *your* people. Primally Pure offers beautiful, thoughtful, hand-crafted solutions to the safer and natural skincare puzzle.

settings.label: Testimonial 2
settings.default: The PP affiliate program is super user friendly. It's simple to use across any marketing platform which makes getting better skincare into people's hands that much easier. Primally Pure uses real ingredients for real bodies without any of the stuff you don't want. It's a farm to shelf business that provides people with a solution to the toxic skincare problem, all while giving better results! Nature really is smarter than science. If you're anything like me, you're constantly singing the praises of Primally Pure Skincare to friends and family, and how much it's completely transformed your life, so why not turn that sale into a commission for yourself and get some free product along the way!

settings.label: Testimonial 2 Attribution
settings.default: - Vanessa Barajas | Clean Eating with a Dirty Mind

settings.label: Testimonial 3
settings.default: I truly love sharing products that I truly stand behind, use in my daily life, and absolutely love! I love partnering with PP because I trust them and their integrity. The care that goes into each product is often not seen in this industry. I love the quick shipping and the great customer service, too. I would say, if you love the products it is a great way to share them with others while creating some additional income!!

settings.label: Testimonial 4
settings.default: The biggest thing I love is working with a company that is SO genuine, kind, responsive, & all-around amazing. It's so hard to find!! The Primally Pure team is just the best. I think what sets Primally Pure apart is how much they care about their products and mission. Also how kind they all are! It's always so refreshing to work with such a great team that truly cares so much. Primally Pure's affiliate program can be something that grows to become a great passive side income. Also, you get to share the non-toxic mission with your community! There's really zero downside.

settings.label: Testimonial 5
settings.default: I have been using, loving and raving about Primally Pure’s products since it’s humble beginnings and it’s so fun to watch this beautiful company become a leader in the non-toxic skincare industry and continue to create such awesome safe products. I love being able to refer my loved ones, clients and podcast listeners to such a high quality, high performing skincare line…one I use on the daily. I cannot speak highly enough about the Primally Pure Affiliate Program! It has been so easy to navigate and one of my favorite aspects has been working with the Primally Pure team–they are so helpful, responsive and just down right wonderful women. It’s been a great way to monetize my social platforms and share a company and products I truly love and believe in!

settings.label: Treatment 1 Definition
settings.default: "having the power to restore freshness, vitality, energy."

settings.label: Treatment 1 Description
settings.default: This facial focuses on refreshing the skin + self in less time. Choose between a custom mask formulation to care for specific skin concerns or therapeutic massage techniques to treat the skin from within - and support your overall sense of wellness.

settings.label: Treatment 1 Price Description
settings.default: Experience REFRESH as an introductory treatment or a pick-me-up for your complexion, if you’re tight on time.

settings.label: Treatment 2 Definition
settings.default: "to make or become free of impurities; clear; pure."

settings.label: Treatment 2 Description
settings.default:
This refining treatment begins with a soothing foot soak and visibly clarifies the complexion with a holistic approach to minimizing breakouts and brightening uneven skin tone. Relieve congestion, diminish discoloration, and detoxify impurities with anti-inflammatory ingredients, purifying mask therapies and powerful touch techniques such as Facial Gua Sha and Manual Lymphatic Drainage (MLD) to optimize the flow of oxygen + vital nutrients to the skin. Better flow, brighter glow - inside and out.

This facial is also available as a back treatment to relieve breakouts on this hard to reach area.

settings.label: Treatment 2 Price Description
settings.default: Supports oil-rich, acne-prone, hyperpigmentation, discoloration, dull skin types.

settings.label: Treatment 3 Definition
settings.default: "to calm, as a person or the feelings; relieve, comfort, or refresh."

settings.label: Treatment 3 Description
settings.default: This reparative treatment begins with a soothing foot soak and deeply soothes sensitive, stressed or damaged skin to create a calm, balanced complexion. Healing herbs, restorative mask formulations and a strong focus on Manual Lymphatic Drainage (MLD) help to relieve redness, discomfort, and inflammation in the skin. Treat reactive skin from within and bring your skin + whole self back to a state of rest.

settings.label: Treatment 3 Price Description
settings.default: Supports sensitive, reactive, stressed, inflamed, damaged, dry skin types.

settings.label: Treatment 4 Description
settings.default: This targeted treatment begins with a soothing foot soak and powerfully rejuvenates and plumps the skin to promote a more youthful complexion by softening fine lines + signs of aging and strengthening the integrity of the skin. Vitamin-rich ingredients, potent mask therapies and advanced massage techniques, such as Facial Gua Sha and Herbal Poultice, infuse the skin with vital nutrients, naturally lift + tighten skin, and visibly sculpt facial muscles for a more vibrant, healthy appearance - and overall well-being.

settings.label: Treatment 4 Price Description
settings.default: Supports mature, aging, dull, dehydrated skin types.

settings.label: Note 1
settings.default: For optimal results, a weekly series of four treatments followed by monthly maintenance facials is recommended. Connect with your Holistic Esthetician to create a personalized Skin Therapy Series to reach your desired skin results.

settings.label: Note 2
settings.default: Extractions are only included at the discretion of the Holistic Esthetician or per personal request. Your skincare professional may choose to focus on more targeted therapies to treat causes of breakouts + blackheads from within to create a clear complexion that lasts.

settings.label: Spa Technique 1: Text
settings.default:
Facial Gua Sha is an ancient healing technique that visibly rejuvenates the skin through light pulling + lifting massage motions using a smooth gemstone tool. It works with the skin to support and optimize the body’s own reparative functions by promoting lymphatic drainage, calming the nervous system, clearing blockages + buildup of toxins and excess fluid, and increasing the flow of oxygen and vital nutrients to the skin.

The results are felt immediately and include detoxifying, depuffing, softening fine lines + wrinkles, sculpting facial muscles, brightening skin tone, releasing tension and improving the overall health of the skin. With consistent use - combined with a healthy lifestyle - Facial Gua Sha creates significant and long-term transformation in the skin and overall sense of wellness.

settings.label: Spa Technique 2: Text
settings.default: Herbal Poultice is a restorative muscle treatment that has been used for its medicinal benefits for centuries. A steamed compress of organic healing herbs and specialized massage movements work together to stimulate circulation, calm the nervous system, support lymphatic drainage and promote a strong sense of relaxation in the body and mind. Herbal Poultice powerfully helps to detoxify impurities, reduce puffiness, release muscular tension, smooth fine lines + wrinkles, naturally lift and contour, create a glowing complexion and a balanced state of being.

settings.label: Spa Technique 3: Text
settings.default:
This targeted treatment technique consists of gentle, rhythmic, pumping motions to powerfully support the lymphatic system. The lymphatic system cleanses + detoxifies tissues and supplies life-giving nutrients that are essential for the health of the skin and body. Because it does not have its own internal pump to activate these processes, it depends on an external force (such as MLD) to manually manipulate tissue and promote optimal functioning.

Stagnant lymph leads to inflammation, congestive skin conditions such as chronic acne, eczema or rosacea, and premature aging of our cells. This highly specialized treatment boosts immunity, minimizes puffiness, soothes sensitivities, improves the integrity of the skin and has an incredibly calming effect on the nervous system to support deeper healing from within. With consistent use - combined with a healthy lifestyle - MLD produces rapid results and restores skin health holistically.

Our Holistic Esthetician is trained + certified to perform the Dr. Vodder method of MLD.

settings.label: A1
settings.default: A credit card is required to reserve all skin treatments.

settings.label: A2
settings.default: A credit card is required to reserve all skin treatments.

settings.label: A3
settings.default: A credit card is required to reserve all skin treatments.

settings.label: A4
settings.default: We understand scheduling conflicts can arise and if you need to cancel or reschedule your treatment for any reason, please do so 24 hours prior to your scheduled service. If less than a 24 hour notice is given or if you do not arrive for your appointment, it will result in a full charge to the credit card on file.

settings.label: A5
settings.default: THE SPA is located at 41120 Elm Street Suite A, Murrieta, California. Be sure to include Suite A when using GPS. Free parking is accessible in front of Suite A and additional parking is available behind our building.

settings.label: A6
settings.default: THE SPA is only able to accept credit card payments for Holistic Skin Treatments. However, cash is accepted if you would like to leave gratuity.

settings.label: A7
settings.default: Formulated using real ingredients derived from nature for maximum purity + potency, Primally Pure is the only product line we carry and incorporate in all of our Holistic Skin Treatments. Made with only 100% natural + non-toxic ingredients, Primally Pure supports skin health with fewer ingredients, for superior results.

settings.label: A8
settings.default: We're committed to creating the most restful, restorative space possible. While we love kids, please keep them at home - for our sake and yours ;) Holistic Skin Treatments can be scheduled for teenagers 13+.

settings.label: A9
settings.default: We're committed to creating the most restful, restorative space possible. While we love kids, please keep them at home - for our sake and yours ;) Holistic Skin Treatments can be scheduled for teenagers 13+.

settings.label: Q1
settings.default: My tracking information says “Delivered” but I haven’t received my package.

settings.label: A1
settings.default: We recently made a change to our shipping process in an effort to improve our customer experience, however, there were unforeseen issues with the new 3rd party we started using. Effective immediately, we have switched back to our previous partner while we continue to look for additional ways to make the experience even better. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience and will be in touch with all impacted customers soon.

settings.label: Q2
settings.default: Do you have a sample regimen?

settings.label: A2
settings.default:
While everyone's skin is unique and requires customized care, there are some guidelines we suggest following when it comes to applying skincare products. This is our simple skincare routine for the evening:

  • Cleansing Oil and/or Baby Bar: Begin with a clean, fresh canvas
  • Complexion Mist or Everything Spray: Replenish skin + prep skin for moisture
  • Skin-Specific Facial Serum (Plumping, Clarifying or Soothing): Target specific skin needs
  • Beauty Cream or Baby Balm (if needed): Moisturize and nourish

Watch a tutorial here

settings.label: A3
settings.default: Once you make your purchase, if you find that our product isn't meeting your expectations, we will always work with you to come to a suitable solution. Please contact us if you have any questions or concerns about your purchase.

settings.label: Q4
settings.default: I’m experiencing irritation from the deodorant, what should I do?

settings.label: A4
settings.default: Irritation can occur when you’re switching to a natural deodorant and some people may have a sensitivity to baking soda. Please take a peek at our informative blog post, Irritation From Natural Deodorant and What to Do About It. It’s filled with the best tips and tricks to help you transition from conventional deodorant to our safe, non-toxic alternative.

settings.label: A5
settings.default: At this time, we do not offer samples of most products because all of our products are hand-made.

settings.label: Q6
settings.default: I signed up for a subscription, but I don’t have an account?

settings.label: A6
settings.default: It's likely that upon first subscribing, you checked out without creating a subscription account. To log in, you'll need to create an account first by associating your order with an account: https://primallypure.com/account/register. Please use the same email address used when placing your first order. Once logged into your account, you'll be able to swap scents, change frequency, skip an order and more!

settings.label: Q7
settings.default: I can’t seem to get my promotional code to work? What could I be doing wrong?

settings.label: A7
settings.default: The way our system works, we can only accommodate one promotion to be used per transaction. With that being said, please feel free to use the promotion that is of greater value on your purchase. Also, because our deodorant subscriptions include free shipping, we aren't able to apply an additional promotion to these types of orders.

settings.label: Q8
settings.default: I’m local and would love to utilize your local pickup option. How do I go about doing this?

settings.label: A8
settings.default: Please place your local pickup order 24 hours prior to pickup in order to ensure that items will be ready/available when you arrive during our specially reserved pickup hours which are Monday-Saturday, 9am-4pm.

settings.label: Copy the classes from the add-to-cart button for the 'Complete Subscription' button?
settings.info: If checked, Recurring Orders will attempt to automatically match the style of our 'Complete Subscription' button with your theme's 'Add-to-cart' button. The 'Complete Subscription' button is used when Recurring Orders is in Single-Product mode and for subscriptions that have a 'Prepaid' option.

settings.info: Enter any additional class names that you would like to use to style the 'Complete Subscription' button.

settings.content: If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the  spelling to use here, refer to the first checkout page.

Do not forget to include the snippet shipping-calculator in your cart.liquid template where you want the shipping  calculator to appear. You can get the snippet here: [shipping-calculator.liquid](https://github.com/carolineschnapp/shipping-calculator/blob/master/shipping-calculator.liquid) .
